htmlbody: Kgotlas were and still are an effective means of governance in smallish groups. It's effectiveness may continue, however there is a concern that even it will suffer due to the changes that technology is creating. Scale that up to the size of some democratic nations and there's a problem. Fractionalized views, polarized views and inequality are vocal and often unfriendly or selfish approaches. So let's see what thinking exists from differing groups as to what the future of democracy will be.
title: The Future of Democracy
